attributes.action: Grazia Equal Pay campaign to get Section 78 of the Equality Act enacted
attributes.additional_details:
Grazia magazine is petitioning for Section 78 of the Equality Act 2010 to be enacted. This would mean businesses with 250 employees or more would have to publish anonymised details annually about the hourly pay of men and women they employ.
This transparency would help end the gender pay divide.
